title: Ben Gumpert
summary: Russell Benjamin Wallace Gumpert, known as Ben Gumpert, QC (born 27 February 1963) is a Crown Court Judge, (styled His Honour Judge Gumpert QC) and former barrister, specialising in international and domestic criminal law. Gumpert was previously a Senior Trial Lawyer at the International Criminal Court (ICC), leading the prosecution team in the case against Dominic Ongwen In 2012 Gumpert prosecuted to conviction the first 'modern slavery' case (R v Connors and ors.) in the UK
